sentences.en: According to Festinger s cognitive dissonance theory, peoples cognitive system has a tendency to keep consonance.
sentences.cn: 费斯汀格认知不协调理论认为, 人的认知系统有保持协调一致的倾向.

sentences.en: As such dissonance is healed, the opportunity for a recovery can come forth.
sentences.cn: 当这样的冲突被疗愈, 痊愈的良机会展现.

sentences.en: For an example, have a look at my report of this classic study of cognitive dissonance.
sentences.cn: 可以参考我撰写的关于这一经典研究的报告:认知不一致.

sentences.en: In acoustics he studied the propagation of sound and musical consonance and dissonance.
sentences.cn: 在声学中,他研究了声的传播和音乐的和谐与不和谐.

sentences.en: Minerals can also be programmed into dissonance.
sentences.cn: 矿石也可以被编程为不共振的.

sentences.en: Music To cause ( a tone or chord ) to progress from dissonance to consonance.
sentences.cn: 使 ( 音调或和弦 ) 从不和谐向和谐发展.

sentences.en: Music To lead up to and soften ( a dissonance or its impact ) by means of preparation.
sentences.cn: 通过准备调渐渐引入并柔和 ( 不和谐音及其冲击 )

sentences.en: Psychologists talk about ego , id, and cognitive dissonance.
sentences.cn: 心理学家讨论利己主义 、 本能冲动和感知不协调.

sentences.en: Such dissonance is related to conflict between the masculine and feminine or the body and soul.
sentences.cn: 这些不协调与男女性之间或者身体与灵魂间的冲突连结.

sentences.en: The augmented fourth is also a dissonance, an unstable interval that needs to move consonance.
sentences.cn: 加四度也是不稳定的不协和音程,需要变为协和音程.

sentences.en: To lead up to and soften ( a dissonance or its impact ) by means of preparation.
sentences.cn: 调(音)通过准备调渐渐引入并柔和 ( 不和谐音及其冲击 )

words.tran_cn: 刺耳的；不谐和的；不调和的
不一致；不调和；不和谐音

phrases.tran_cn: 认知失调；认知悔误；内心冲突

trans.tran_en: a combination of notes that sound strange because they are not in  harmony
